name: REGULAR CLEANING
text:
Our Regular Cleaning option consists of the following

  • Dusting
  • Sweeping and or Vacuuming floors
  • Mopping all rooms
  • Kitchen counters cleaned and disinfected
  • Stove tops cleaned and disinfected
  • Bathroom Vanity’s wiped and disinfected
  • Tub or Shower tiles cleaned and disinfected
  • Toilets cleaned thoroughly and disinfected
  • Trash removal

name: DEEP CLEANING
text:
Our Deep Cleaning option consists of the following

  • Dusting blinds, window sills and light fixtures ( within arms reach )
  • Window sills wiped
  • Sweeping and or vacuuming floors
  • Mopping all rooms
  • Cleaning interior windows and sliding doors ( Within arms reach )
  • Kitchen counters cleaned and disinfected
  • Kitchen Sink cleaned and disinfected
  • Stove tops cleaned and disinfected
  • Kitchen tables cleaned off
  • Interior and Exterior of microwave wiped down
  • Bathroom Vanity’s wiped and disinfected
  • Tub or Shower tiles scrubbed and disinfected
  • Mirrors and shower tracks Cleaned
  • Toilets cleaned thoroughly and disinfected
  • Trash removal

name: MOVE IN/OUT CLEANING
text:
Our Move In/Out Cleaning option consists of the following

  • Dusting blinds, window sills and light fixtures ( within arms reach )
  • Window sills wiped
  • Sweeping and or vacuuming floors
  • Mopping all rooms
  • Cleaning interior windows and sliding doors ( Within arms reach )
  • Kitchen counters cleaned and disinfected
  • Kitchen Sink cleaned and disinfected
  • Stove tops cleaned and disinfected
  • Interior and Exterior of microwave wiped down
  • Hand cleaned bedroom baseboards
  • Bathroom Vanity’s wiped and disinfected
  • Tub or Shower tiles scrubbed and disinfected
  • Mirrors and shower tracks Cleaned
  • Toilets cleaned thoroughly and disinfected
  • Kitchen Cabinets wiped down ( Exterior )
  • Bathroom Cabinets wiped down ( Exterior )
  • Refrigerator Wiped ( Exterior )
  • Trash Removal

name: OFFICE CLEANING
text:
Our Office cleaning option consists of the following

  • Dusting
  • Sweeping, Vacuuming also Mopping the office space
  • Kitchen ( if one Available )
  • Kitchen counters wiped and disinfected
  • Break Room ( if one Available ) Cleaned and disinfected
  • Interior and Exterior of microwave wiped down
  • Bathroom Hand Washing areas wiped and disinfected
  • Toilets cleaned thoroughly and disinfected
  • Trash removal

name: REFRIGERATOR CLEANING
text: Interior and Exterior Professional Refrigerator cleaning
